channel.title: alberto on OWASP ZAP

item.title: Alberto's GSoC 2014 Project for ZAP SOAP Scanner Add-On
item.description: Hello everybody, my name is Alberto Verza, a 23 year student from Spain, and this summer I have participated in Google Summer of Code 2014. My project was the SOAP Scanner add-on for ZAP, in which I worked during all the Program. Let me explain you the features it includes.
